page.title: 19LOCAL ISSUES: EDUCATION 2.
page.content: TASK GROUP PUBLIC MEETING:JUNE 1985. After various meetings in the two villages and a joint staff meeting of the two schools a public meeting was held in Lincoln. This meeting was very well attended and strong representation was made by the local people to keep both schools in their present forms. Both schools perform valuable functions within their respective villages, not only the school function, but Youth Clubs and Evening Institute Classes. It was also pointed out that neither school could accommodate all the pupils in the area and so it would cost more to bus children from one school to another. Local people will now have to wait until the Autumn to hear the two recommendations from the Task Group which will be put before the Council for action.
